net.kuujo.copycat.collections

Interface AsyncSet<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedSet

    public interface AsyncSet<T>
    Asynchronous set.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

      • isEmpty

        Checks whether the set is empty.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with a boolean value indicating whether the set is empty.

        CompletableFuture<Void> clear()
        Removes all values from the set.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the operation is complete.
